<< nmm_build_help modules manager removemodule >>

nmm_build_loader

helper's function to build main loader.m of an external module

Syntax

nmm_build_loader(module_short_name, module_root_path)

Input argument

module_short_name

a string: short module's name.

module_root_path

a string: path of the module named 'module_short_name'.

Description

nmm_build_loader generates main loader.m of an external module.

Example

See module skeleton for example

% see builder.m

See also

addmodule.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET

<< nmm_build_help modules manager removemodule >>
